Straight Shot turns her attentions to Nightshift and remains hidden to see =
what he would do next.  Like him, the sight of Dark Rodimus was enough to d=
im her trust in the real Rodimus Prime as she remembers what had happened t=
o him in the past.  She opens a com link to Tucson directly.

" Tucson, it'=
s me, look, I think ya might have ta take leadership privileges away from R=
odimus.  He's turned evil again.  And I don't think Nightshift or anyone el=
se is gonna trust him after this.  I know I won't. " 

Tucson gets her call=
 while holding onto Noctorro, flying him back to where the other injured Fu=
zors are to stand guard until help got to them.  His eyes narrow.

" I was =
afraid of this, Noctorro.  Rodimus has been taken again.  Straight Shot is =
right, he can't be trusted.  And he accuses me of not being in my right of =
mind..  Not good, not good at all."

He continues his flight while carefull=
y tending to his comrade. 

" Leo Prime, I am flying Noctorro back to the d=
amaged Fuzors and I will stand guard with them until help arrives.  In the =
mean time, Rodimus has fallen back into evil hands and I think it's best if=
 he is barred from leadership duties until further notice.  I don't like be=
ing this harsh, but right now he can't be trusted.  Tell Bump to secure Nig=
htlight in the med bay and put the Ark in immediate lockdown. We can't affo=
rd to take any chances."

Nightshift continues to keep his doors locked and=
 engine in drive for quick escape if need be.  He wasn't about to let Dark =
Rodimus get to Elita.  If anything he knew that returning her to the Ark wo=
uld also put his other comrades at risk.  That too was out of the question.=
  

 " I don't think so, Punk, you ain't puttn one mean aft hand on anyone =
if I can help it!  You gotta outrun me first before ya even THINK about get=
t'n your hands on her!   Hold on tight kid, I think we're in for a little c=
ar chase."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
